title: MUFG rejoins Yes Bank race, submits initial bid for a majority stake
description: Japanâ€™s MUFG has re-entered the race to acquire a majority stake in Yes Bank after its proposal to invest in HDB Financial was rejected. MUFG has submitted a non-binding offer and is conducting due diligence, negotiating mainly with Yes Bank and SBI.
